channel.title: 1337 of the w33k (5/16-5/20) and a Month of 0x00sec
channel.description:
Alright: This w33k, this honor is awarded to @n3xUs, for his articles on [Social Engineering](https://0x00sec.org/t/social-engineering-part-2-elicitation/420/5). Keep it up, buddy.
You can see who has gotten 1337 of the w33k by checking out its [badge](https://0x00sec.org/badges/101/1337-of-the-w33k).
### We've been here for a month!
Today, 5/21/16 marks one month of 0x00sec! Can you remember how it all was a month ago? I can -- and I'll say it has improved and evolved _tremendously_.
On behalf of all the staff, I thank this community for a month of greatness. Also, congrats, @n3xUs!
See ya later, oaktree

item.title: 1337 of the w33k (5/16-5/20) and a Month of 0x00sec
item.dc:creator: n3xUs
item.description:
Thanks a lot! Really! It truly is an honor! Thanks you all for all your support!

Read full topic
